remarks: Lemma for ~ cygzn .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
cygzn.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
cygzn.n $e |- N = if ( B e. Fin , ( # ` B ) , 0 ) $.
cygzn.y $e |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
cygzn.m $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
cygzn.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Y ) $.
cygzn.e $e |- E = { x e. B | ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. x ) ) = B } $.
cygzn.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CycGrp ) $.
cygzn.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. E ) $.
cygznlem1 $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( K e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) ) -> ( ( L ` K ) = ( L ` M ) <-> ( K .x. X ) = ( M .x. X ) ) ) $.
$d .x. n x $.
$d B n x $.
$d G n x $.
